title: LF3M ranked 5s, pref gold-diamond
body:
Hey ppl, setting up a ranked 5s team today, plan on starting around 3-4 to pump some games out.
Currently have a diamond adc and plat toplaner, but all roles considered if you're competent enough.
Need to be active on voice comms (skype pref, mic necessary)
Gold-diamond preferred, but as long as you're willing to follow calls and comps will be considered.
Post ign, main roles and main champs either below or add me on league. 
Ign: Pantster

replies.body:
I am a gold 3 mid laner main! Add me tormenteddream

i have 4 very strong picks "Ryze, tf, yasuo, j4" but i can also play "kayle ahri ez really well"
hi,gold5  main top: wukuong,malph and support:leona,zyra and nami.
hi! I am daimond 5, was plat 4 in S3.   I main adc and support! also good at lb, irlia and viktor
Hi. I main support. And play leona, Braun, allistar, janna , lulu, Annie and zyra. Add me if you can play at night
